id.description: The id of the relevant object

name.description: The name or label of the relevant object

debug.description: Set the debug flag for this object

check_ip_host.description: The hostname to use for this connection

request_no_context_takeover.description: request the client to not takeover compression context from message to message (default: false)

request_max_window_bits.description: request the client to use a maximum compression window size of this many bits. Permissible values are 8 .. 15 (default: 15)

no_context_takeover.description: while sending, do not takeover compression context from message to message (default: false)

max_window_bits.description: while sending, use a maximum compression window size of this many bits. Permissible values are 8 .. 15 (default: 15)

memory_level.description: while sending, limit memory consumption to this level. Permissible values are 1 .. 9 (default: 8)

allowed_origins.description: A list of allowed WebSocket origins - can use * as a wildcard character, e.g. ['https://*.tavendo.com', 'http://localhost:8080']

external_port.description: The external visible port this service be reachable under (i.e. when running behind a L2/L3 forwarding device) (default: null)

enable_hybi10.description: Enable Hybi-10 version of WebSocket (an intermediary spec). (default: true)

enable_rc6455.description: Enable RFC6455 version of WebSocket (the final spec). (default: true)

enable_webstatus.description: Enable the WebSocket server's status rendering page. (default: true)

validate_utf8.description: Validate incoming WebSocket text messages for UTF8 conformance. (default: true)

mask_server_frames.description: Mask server-sent WebSocket frames. WARNING: Enabling this will break protocol compliance! (default: false)

require_masked_client_frames.description: Require all WebSocket frames received to be masked. (default: true)

apply_mask.description: Actually apply WebSocket masking (both in- and outgoing). (default: true)

max_frame_size.description: Maximum size in bytes of incoming WebSocket frames accepted or 0 to allow any size. (default: 0)

max_message_size.description: Maximum size in bytes of incoming WebSocket messages accepted or 0 to allow any size. (default: 0)

auto_fragment_size.description: Automatically fragment outgoing WebSocket messages into WebSocket frames of payload maximum specified size in bytes or 0 to disable. (default: 0)

fail_by_drop.description: On severe errors (like WebSocket protocol violations), brutally drop the TCP connection instead of performing a full WebSocket closing handshake. (default: false)

echo_close_codereason.description: uring a WebSocket closing handshake initiated by a peer, echo the peer's close code and reason. Otherwise reply with code 1000 and no reason. (default: false)

tcp_nodelay.description: Set the TCP No-Delay ('Nagle') socket option (default: true)

require_websocket_subprotocol.description: Require WebSocket clients to properly announce the WAMP-WebSocket subprotocols it is able to speak. This can be one or more from wamp.2.json, wamp.2.msgpack, wamp.2.json.batched and wamp.2.json.batched. Crossbar.io will by default require the client to announce the subprotocols it supports and select one of the announced subprotocols. If this option is set to false, Crossbar.io will no longer require the client to announce subprotocols and assume wamp.2.json when no WebSocket subprotocol is announced. (default: true)

tls.description: Options associated with a TLS endpoint

version.title: The schema version this file relates to
